The GG Supreme carry-on duffle bag is designed with a vintage influence, trimmed with brown leather details and the House web in green and red in double stripes.

The carry-on is completed with a detachable and adjustable strap, lock with key holder and luggage tag.

Beige/ebony GG Supreme canvas, a material with low environmental impact, with brown leather trim Green and red Web Antique gold-toned hardware. Insert in leather made through an alternative metal or chrome free tanning process, reducing the environmental footprint compared to traditional methods. Eco nylon lining.

Interior zip pockets. Top handle with 13cm drop. Detachable and adjustable nylon shoulder strap with 50cm drop. Zipper closure.

Medium size: W36cm x H37cm x D13cm. Weight: 1kg. Made in Italy.

Inspired by the house's emblematic 1971 style, this iconic vinyl jacket features a tone-on-tone AC logo inlaid on the chest.

Gucci Off The Grid is the first collection from Gucci Circular Lines— a concept created to support the House's vision for circular production. Designed for those mindful of their environmental impact, Gucci Off The Grid uses recycled, organic, bio-based and sustainably sourced materials.

Blue GG nylon made from ECONYL®— a nylon fabric sourced from regenerated materials (from fish nets, carpets and other scraps) that can be recycled and recreated, aiding in decreasing its ecological footprint.

Black leather trim. Lining in viscose sourced from sustainably managed forests. Insert in leather made through an alternative metal or chrome free tanning process, reducing the environmental footprint compared to traditional methods.

Four card slots. Zipper pocket ID window. Zipper closure.

Gucci Off The Grid is the first collection from Gucci Circular Lines— a concept created to support the House's vision for circular production. Designed for those mindful of their environmental impact, Gucci Off The Grid uses recycled, organic, bio-based and sustainably sourced materials. Regenerated nylon, crafted using recycled sewing thread and trims displays the GG pattern against an opaque background in a blue shade.

The belt bag is completed with an adjustable buckle closure and front zipper pocket. Blue GG nylon made from ECONYL®— a nylon fabric sourced from regenerated materials that can be recycled and recreated, aiding in decreasing its ecological footprint.

White leather trims made from leather tanned through an alternative metal or chrome free tanning process, reducing the environmental footprint compared to traditional methods. Palladium-toned metal hardware made from recycled brass alloys with nickel-free finishes. Ribbon trims and plastic buckles made from recycled materials. Sewn using recycled polyester thread. Regenerated nylon lining.

Exterior: front zipper pocket. Interior: 1 zipper pocket, 1 open pocket. Nylon strap with buckle closure. Zipper closure.

Dimensions: W24cm x H14cm x D5.5cm Weight: 0.5kg.

Made in Italy.

product-name: GG Marmont medium matelassé shoulder bag
description:
Made in matelassé chevron leather with a heart on the back in a vibrant hibiscus red, the recognizable medium GG Marmont chain shoulder bag has a softly structured shape and a flap closure with Double G hardware.

Designed to be worn multiple ways, the chain strap slides to change between a shoulder and a top handle bag.

Hibiscus red matelassé chevron leather with heart. Palladium-toned hardware. Microfibre lining with a suede-like finish.

Interior zipper pocket. Sliding chain strap can be worn as a shoulder strap with 55cm drop or can be worn as a top handle with 30cm drop. Flap with spring closure. The Gucci card case wallet will fit inside this product.

Medium size: W31cm x H19cm x D7cm. This item can fit a cell phone up to W78mm x H158mm x D8mm. Weight: 0.8kg approximately. Made in Italy.

Inspired by the House's iconic 1971 model, this iconic vinyl jacket features a white AC logo inlay on the chest.

With two side pockets and a visible white lacquered snap closure on the middle front and cuffs as well as a stand-up collar. This model is lined.

The cut of the vinyl jacket from the Reissue collection is close to that of the iconic 1971 model. It is close to the body and was designed to be worn open.

For more comfort, we recommend that you choose a size larger than your usual size.

product-name: GG Marmont small matelassé shoulder bag
description:
Made in matelassé chevron leather with a heart on the back in a light shade of blue, the recognizable small GG Marmont chain shoulder bag has a softly structured shape and a flap closure with Double G hardware.

Designed to be worn multiple ways, the chain strap slides to change between a shoulder and a top handle bag.

Pastel blue matelassé chevron leather with heart. Palladium-toned hardware.

Microfibre lining with a suede-like finish. Interior zipper pocket.

Sliding chain strap can be worn as a shoulder strap with 55cm drop or can be worn as a top handle with 30cm drop. Flap with spring closure.

Small size: W26cm x H15cm x D7cm. This item can fit a cell phone up to W78mm x H158mm x D8mm. The Gucci card case wallet will fit inside this product. Weight: 0.7kg approximately.

Made in Italy.

GG Marmont super mini bag in matelassé leather with a diagonal stripes.

The small accessory is completed with a textured version of the Double G—a contemporary take on an archival detail from the '70s.

Black diagonal matelassé leather with a vintage effect. Cerise leather trim with a vintage effect. Antique gold-toned hardware. Detachable key ring. Detachable chain strap with 60cm drop. Magnetic closure.

Super mini size: W17.5cm x H11.5cm x D4cm Weight: 0.3kg approximately.

Made in Italy.

Designed to be worn multiple ways, the chain strap slides to change between a shoulder and a top handle bag.
